relaxed\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wrists posture\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Head upright over your shoulders in a relaxed position, with your eyes looking slightly downward\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Backrest supporting your lower back, pelvis, and the natural curve of your spine\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thighs hips\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feet postures reduce stress on the body. However, any posture — including sitting — held for a prolonged period can lead to fatigue or discomfort. Varying your posture, while keeping it within a comfortable, supported range, can reduce fatigue and discomfort.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The remaining sections of this guide provide information on how to adjust your chair, rearrange your workstation layout, and improve lighting so that you can use the posture shown above and below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":61292,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/384e3418-0a54-47ca-8034-53eec28f8245/Hazard3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/384e3418-0a54-47ca-8034-53eec28f8245/Hazard3.JPG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Hazard3.JPG\",\"name\":\"Hazard3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"384e3418-0a54-47ca-8034-53eec28f8245\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":481,\"height\":627},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
